fields.name: deleted
fields.doc: Soft delete of the resolver group

fields.name: slackChannel
fields.doc: Slack channel of the resolver group

fields.name: email
fields.doc: Email address of the resolver group

fields.name: userIds
fields.doc: Ids of the users that are part of this resolver group

fields.name: creatorUserId
fields.doc: User ID of the creator of the resolver group

fields.name: updaterUserId
fields.doc: User ID of the person who was the last person to update the resolver group

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.doc: Latest time at which the resolver group has been updated

fields.name: eventId
fields.doc: Unique ID for the Kafka event

fields.name: traceToken
fields.doc: Trace token for this request, coming from upstream service
